name: TheAtlantic
text: "One conclusion to draw from Monday’s denial to hear those cases is that Chief Justice Roberts may not be so in favor of broadly expanding the scope of the Second Amendment," @adamwinkler writes: https://t.co/DToggsEglT

name: TheAtlantic
text: Over the course of the coronavirus crisis, @khushbuoshea’s relatives have sent her homeopathic “cures,” astrological charts predicting the end of the pandemic, and conspiracy theories. She writes about why misinformation spreads in families: https://t.co/QIRsOM5e30

name: TheAtlantic
text: "When the fateful moment arrives, Trump would need to accept that same sobering reality that [Al] Gore absorbed: He lost," @PeterAtlantic writes. https://t.co/iFfPADfBjb

name: TheAtlantic
text: Photos: Cautious Reopenings Across Europe—via @TheAtlPhoto: https://t.co/gu0D6m76RY

name: TheAtlantic
text: Gordon Parks' work for Life magazine "did nothing less than revolutionize what a 'crime photo' could look like," the magazine's former editor-in-chief, @Bill_Shapiro writes. https://t.co/vCX7rWl9x0

name: TheAtlantic
text: iPads wrapped in plastic bags. Zoom goodbyes. The coronavirus made caring for the sickest patients “an entirely new universe,” @sarahzhang reports. https://t.co/BgewNJpltJ

name: TheAtlantic
text: Social-media callouts have been criticized as a distraction from on-the-ground activism, but recent weeks have shown that they’re part of the protest, @skornhaber writes: https://t.co/RrewRglmVe

name: TheAtlantic
text: Understanding the present moment requires grappling with a history stained by racial inequity. We compiled a list of writing on race and racism spanning @TheAtlantic's 163-year history: https://t.co/WN4hnuyQex

name: TheAtlantic
text: .@byjoelanderson joins @jameshamblin & @katlwells to explain the NBA's plan to restart the season in Orlando. https://t.co/iGtf8uonDl

name: TheAtlantic
text: Listen to @IsaacDovere interview @JumaaneWilliams about activism, police reform, and his hope for change: https://t.co/CfGNXMdEqa

name: TheAtlantic
text: “Grocery shopping is no longer one in a long list of mundane errands,” @bbosker writes. For many people, it’s the only one. “And it now seems not inevitable, but somewhat amazing to be able to do at all.” https://t.co/IMqhhmcFEc

name: TheAtlantic
text: "If police around the country actually want to maintain or restore order, my own research suggests that they would do better to ignore the president and try negotiating with the protesters," @myersdanielj writes: https://t.co/kqO6e4Rmrf

name: TheAtlantic
text:
Quaker Oats announced that it will change the name and image of its Aunt Jemima brand.

Racist images of black people have long been used to sell happiness or nostalgia, the founder and director of the Jim Crow Museum of Racist Memorabilia told us in 2012. https://t.co/WL9dbILsuX

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Standing in front of my black students, I knew that it was my responsibility to invite them into the classroom and then to see, push, and protect them once they were there," writes Pirette McKamey, a high-school principal and educator for over 30 years: https://t.co/RfRahY46Se

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The coronavirus pandemic and the national focus on injustice and inequality since the killing of George Floyd are combining to increase players’ leverage over their school," Donald H. Yee writes: https://t.co/CtJOZI3GCw

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Qualified immunity has been perhaps the biggest little-known barrier to rectifying constitutional violations through the justice system. Repealing it would achieve much in a single stroke," @EricSchnurer writes: https://t.co/2dd30sQKj8

name: TheAtlantic
text: The supermarket has long been one of the thinnest-margined businesses in existence and one of the least-looked-forward-to places to visit, @bbosker writes. Then came the coronavirus pandemic: https://t.co/9OhWpuJjgR

name: TheAtlantic
text: John Bolton’s new book contains fresh insights into the Trump presidency. Revisit our definitive 2019 profile of Bolton from when he was still Trump’s national security adviser, by @gcaw: https://t.co/QgNUcRz7OE
